Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: [ESPERIENZE PROFESSIONALI CARATTERIZZATE DA ATTIVITÀ DI RICERCA] Quantitative Analyst (Capital Markets Group, with a focus on the fixed-income markets), SANPAOLO BANK (Istituto Bancario San Paolo di Torino SpA, London Branch). Location: Wren House, 15 Carter Lane, London, EC4V 5SP (UK)
[ESPERIENZE PROFESSIONALI CARATTERIZZATE DA ATTIVITÀ DI RICERCA] Advisor (MDOTM, Quantitative Investment Research Company, https://www.mdotm.eu), Milan.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: [RELATORE] European Financial Management Association (EFMA), Annual Conference, Istanbul, giugno 1997. “Home Bias and Conditioning Information: Methodological Issues and Empirical Results”.
[RELATORE] Econometric Society European Meeting (ESEM), Toulouse, settembre 1997. “Home Bias and Conditioning Information: Methodological Issues and Empirical Results”.
[RELATORE] French Finance Association (AFFI), Annual Conference, Lilla, giugno 1998. “A General Treatment of Barrier Options”.
[RELATORE] European Finance Association (EFA), Fontainebleau, agosto 1998. “A General Treatment of Barrier Options”.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Genova, settembre 1998. “The Linear Relationship Between Expected Returns and Price of Risk".
[RELATORE] American Finance Association (AFA), Annual Conference, New York, gennaio 1999. “A General Treatment of Barrier Options”.
[RELATORE] XXIII Convegno Annuale AMASES, settembre 1999. “A General Treatment of Barrier Options”.

[ORGANIZZAZIONE] Organizing Team Member for the International Conference "Family Portfolio Choices" (Finance and Consumption in the European Union), European University Institute, Florence, December 1999 (Invited Speakers included: Angus Deaton, Christian Gollier, Michael Haliassos, James Poterba).
[RELATORE] European Finance Association (EFA), London, agosto 2000. “Hedging Double Barriers with Singles”.

[RELATORE] European Summer Symposium in Financial Markets (ESSFM) Asset Pricing Week, CEPR (Center for Economic Policy Research), Gerzensee (CH), luglio 2002. “Equilibrium Asset Pricing with Time-Varying Pessimism”.
[RELATORE] Applied Mathematics and Applications of Mathematics (AMAM), Nizza, febbraio 2003. “Equilibrium Asset Pricing with Time-Varying Pessimism”.
[RELATORE] The 7th IME (Insurance: Mathematics and Economics) Congress, Lyon, giugno 2003. “Hedging Double Barriers with Singles”.
[RELATORE] European Finance Association (EFA) Meetings, Glasgow (UK), agosto 2003. “Equilibrium Asset Pricing with Time-Varying Pessimism”.
[RELATORE] European Finance Association (EFA) Meetings, Glasgow (UK), agosto 2003. “Structural Rfv: Fundamental Credit Risk Pricing and Hedging with Recovery of Face Value at Default”.

[INVITED LECTURER] Robust Control and Recursive Multiple Priors Utility, Winter School of Financial Mathematics, Lunteren (Olanda), dicembre 2003. “Equilibrium Asset Pricing with Time-Varying Pessimism”.
[RELATORE] The 5th Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Università degli Studi di Siena, gennaio 2004. “Analytic American Option Pricing: The Flat-Barrier Lower Bound”.
[RELATORE] Bachelier Finance Society, the 3rd World Congress, Chicago, luglio 2004. “Analytic American Option Pricing: The Flat-Barrier Lower Bound”.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Modena, settembre 2004. “The premium for switching investment technology when business conditions worsen”.
[RELATORE] C.R.E.D.I.T. 2004, Workshop on Validation of Credit Risk Models, GRETA, Venice, Settembre 2004. “Structural Recovery of Face Value at Default”.
[RELATORE] XXIX Convegno Annuale AMASES, Palermo, Settembre 2005. “Closed-form Pricing of Benchmark Equity Default Swaps under the CEV Assumption”.
[RELATORE] The 6th Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Università Bocconi, Milano, gennaio 2005. “Closed-form Pricing of Benchmark Equity Default Swaps under the CEV Assumption”.
[RELATORE] The 9th Annual International Conference on Real Options, Paris, giugno 2005. “The Value of Fighting Irreversible Demise by Softening the Irreversible Cost”.
[RELATORE] The 7th Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Università degli Studi di Perugia, gennaio 2006. “Momentum and Mean Reversion in Strategic Asset Allocation”.
[RELATORE] ‘From Basel II to Basel III’ Conference, Monte Verità, Ascona (CH), febbraio-marzo 2006. “Systematic Equity-Based Credit Risk: A CEV Model with Jump to Default”.

[RELATORE] Lecturer on Strategic Asset Allocation, International Summer School on Risk Measurement and Control, 5th edition, Roma, giugno 2006. “Momentum and Mean Reversion in Strategic Asset Allocation”.

[RELATORE] The 6th International Conference - ‘Asset Returns and Firm Policies’, Università degli Studi di Verona, SAFE (Center for Studies in Actuarial and Financial Economics), Verona, giugno 2006. “Momentum and Mean Reversion in Strategic Asset Allocation”.
[RELATORE] XXX Convegno Annuale AMASES, Trieste, settembre 2006. “Momentum and Mean Reversion in Strategic Asset Allocation”.

[ORGANIZZAZIONE] Organizing Team Member for the 7th International Conference New Directions in Term Structure Modelling, Università degli Studi di Verona, SAFE (Center for Studies in Actuarial and Financial Economics), Verona, June 25-26, 2007 (Invited Speakers: Mikhail Chernov, Darrell Duffie, Stephen Schaefer, Oldrich Vasicek). Monday, June 25, 2007.

[ORGANIZZAZIONE] 2007 Annual Meetings of the European Finance Association (University of Ljubljana): Doctoral Tutorial in Finance, Faculty Member. In Collaboration with the European Institute for Advanced Studies in Management (EIASM).

[RELATORE] The 8th Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Università degli Studi di Venezia, gennaio 2007. “Real options with a double continuation region / Closed-form optimal investment when present values and costs are jump-diffusions”.

[RELATORE] Swiss Society of Economics and Statistics (SSES) - Annual Meeting, St. Gallen, marzo 2007. “Real options with a double continuation region / Closed-form optimal investment when present values and costs are jump-diffusions”.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Lecce, settembre 2007. “Systematic Equity-Based Credit Risk: A CEV Model with Jump to Default”.

[RELATORE] Workshop on Credit Risk Models for Financial Markets and Banking, Università degli Studi di Rimini, Facultà di Economia, ottobre 2007. PAPER: “Systematic Equity-Based Credit Risk: A CEV Model with Jump to Default”.

[INVITED SPEAKER] International Workshop: CREDIT RISK, organizzato dalla Prof. Monique Jeanblanc, Chaire Risque de Crédit - Fédération Bancaire Française et la Fondation Institut Europlace de Finance, Università of Evry-Val-d'Essonne, giugno 2008. “Systematic Equity-Based Credit Risk: A CEV Model with Jump to Default”.
[RELATORE] The 5th World Congress of the Bachelier Finance Society - Imperial College, Londra, luglio 2008. “Real options with a double continuation region”.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Trento, settembre 2008. “Revisiting corporate growth options in the presence of state-dependent cashflow risk / Why is growth more attractive than value?”.
[RELATORE] The 18th AFIR Colloquium: Financial Risk in a Changing World, Roma, ottobre 2008. “Risk Tolerance Levels for Insurance Companies”.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Parma, settembre 2009. “Reaching nirvana with a defaultable asset?”.
[RELATORE] The 11th Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Università degli Studi di Palermo, gennaio 2010. “Reaching nirvana with a defaultable asset?”.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Macerata, settembre 2010. “Real options and American derivatives: The double continuation region".

[RELATORE] Workshop "Temi attuali nella gestione della previdenza", Università degli Studi di Milano-Bicocca, Dipartimento di Metodi Quantitativi per le Scienze Economiche ed Aziendali, maggio 2012. “Analytical cyclical price-dividend ratios”.

[RELATORE] The 52nd Annual Conference of the Italian Economic Association (SIE), Roma Tre University, Rome, Session on 'Mathematical analysis of financial markets and the global crisis' (co-organized with the AMASES and chaired by Flavio Pressacco), ottobre 2011. “Analytical cyclical price-dividend ratios".
[RELATORE] The 54th Meeting of the Euro Working Group for Commodities and Financial Modelling, Università di Milano-Bicocca, December 2014. "Dynamic asset allocation with default and systemic risk".
[RELATORE] The 16th Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Università degli Studi di Parma, gennaio 2015. "Dynamic asset allocation with default and systemic risk".
[ORGANIZZAZIONE] 2016 Annual Meetings of the European Finance Association (Oslo, Norwegian Business School): Program Committee Reviewing Member.
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Catania, settembre 2016. "Persistence and asset pricing in long-run risk models".
[RELATORE] Convegno Annuale AMASES, Cagliari, settembre 2017. "Structural Recovery of Face Value at Default".

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Affiliato al Center for Economic Research (CentER), Tilburg University, Tilburg (NL).
Affiliato alla Chaire Risque de Crédit (presieduta dalla Prof. Monique Jeanblanc), Université d’Evry, in collaborazione con la Fédération Bancaire Française, Parigi-Evry.
Affiliato al Centre for Applied Research in Finance (CAREFIN), Università Bocconi, Milano.
Affiliato al Centre Research on Analysis and Systematic Use of Information (ELEUSI), Università Bocconi, Milano.

[RICERCA] Assistant Professor. Department of Finance, Tilburg University (NL).

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: RESEARCH PROJECT RESPONSABILITY: "Going Deeper into The Preferences for Domestic Assets", funded with the TMR Grant FMBI960671 by the European Commission, London Business School, London, UK.

RESEARCH PROJECT RESPONSABILITY: "Barrier Options: Financial Markets, Capital Budgeting, and Strategic Decisions", funded with the Marie Curie Fellowship HPMF-CT-2000-00703 by the European Commission, Tilburg University, Tilburg, NL.

RESEARCH PROJECT RESPONSABILITY: "Why Is Growth More Attractive than Value?" (Corporate Growth Options, https://ssrn.com/abstract=1600232), funding awarded in June 2008 by the Centre for Applied Research in Finance (CAREFIN) of Bocconi University, Milan, Italy.
